Thompson points out that, as a British unknown looking for American fame, Simon Cowell used meanness as a savvy PR move- one that wouldn't work for Jennifer Lopez or Steven Tyler . Eric Schmidt was inducted into the American Academy of Arts and Sciences as a fellow in 2007. He is also chairman of the board of directors for the New America Foundation.
